channel.title: Posts on cc
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on cc

item.title: On Emotional Connection, part 2
item.description: Continuing the ludicrous exploration which set off my previous post, I’d like to revisit the term attached. The definition is reproduced below: attached | 2 : emotionally connected : having strong feelings of affection or connection There’s an implication of a connection with emotion as the basis. What exactly does this mean? Maybe different things depending on the context and the individuals involved? Before moving forwards, I’ll also reproduce below a previous snippet of my take on emotion and it’s relation to attraction:

item.title: On Emotional Connection, part 1
item.description: I’m not quite sure where to start for what I said in the previous post, but I figure I at the end of the day I want to understand what love is, so why not use the MW definitons of love as an entry point? Not like I’m going to understand in one day, but a north star would be helpful because I’m sure I’ll get lost along the way.

item.title: Prelude
item.description:
If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them. – Henry David Thoreau, Walden
In hindsight, I’ve been throwing out words like “romantic love” and “emotional connection” without a clear understanding of them. As in, I currently don’t have the ability to clearly and concisely explain to someone what those words mean to me.

item.title: A New Leaf
item.description: Being polite is good, but being active is as important. If you don’t say anything, the things you want won’t appear right before you. – a wise friend Those were the words of my wise friend, who wrote to me years ago. You may remember that I shared them with you too. To this day, I still find myself scared to embrace those words. But there are also times when painfully I realize what he meant.

item.title: Read the Air
item.description: If my message didn’t make sense - that was my nice way of saying, “fuck off because you’re not helping me right now.” I let the first one go but the second just felt disrespectful. Maybe you are not so great at 空気を読むこと, as you hinted at before. And as good as it sounds, I don’t think “treat others the way you want to be treated” needs to apply to every situation.

item.title: Strange
item.description:
I thought you understood, so I was a bit surprised to see you break the silence. That’s cheating.
I see your perspective though. Thoughts have an expiration date. (And feelings have expirations too apparently… as I learned the hard way. fml.)
Thanks for sharing. My initial response was - wtf why are you doing this to me? Stop making me even more sad, lmao. I do like the chords and the voice.

item.title: Your Name
item.description:
As usual, the first thing that crosses my mind when I wake up is your name. Is that disgusting? What’s unusual is that I’ve been waking up way before the time I set on my alarm clock. What’s unusual is that I just lay there for hours, trying to convince myself, you don’t really care about me. Isn’t that disgusting?
As of this point, I still find the need to do this until I can get up again.

item.title: I Need to Know
item.description:
Today I re-listened to the Radwimps song from Weathering with You. The lyrics hurt more than ever.
This is the courage that you gave me So I want to use it for you This is the love that you helped me grow So it won’t mean anything if it’s not with you Is there anything that love can still do? Is there anything that I can still do?

item.title: Partner
item.description: I can see where you are coming from. But there are some things I fail to understand completely. If I had a partner, I’d want them to fulfill as much of my wants as possible. I feel like I’d do anything I can (within reason I guess) to help fulfill my partner’s wants? Like even if you know you can’t do so immediately, wouldn’t you still want to and eventually try to reach a level that you can?

item.title: Broke
item.description:
Every time I reread your words, I increasingly realize that you’re on a different, much higher stratum than the one I am on. They say you can’t buy love, but I’m beginning to think that maybe love is a bit like money? You won’t spend it on others if you don’t have enough yourself, right?
I guess what I’m trying to say is that I’m broke as fuck.

item.title: Meaning
item.description:
Did my life lose all meaning? Everything hurts.
Did life even have meaning before this? Was I just trying to put meaning into it? Is that wrong?

item.title: くちづけDiamond
item.description: Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/IGm7F5 This was a ‘high reach’ piece for me in terms of difficulty. But it’s a special song and a cover had to be done. The most difficult segments of the song are the chorus which feature fast left-hand jumps. Many retakes were done due to a lack of accuracy here. While less obvious, “first verse” at 0:39 (measures 25-32) was also quite challenging.

item.title: 千本桜 YT
item.description: Notes First YouTube upload! The previous Periscopes were captured entirely on phone, but this was the first attempt at using an audio interface in search for better sound quality. I mixed in elements from a few inspirations. Flowering Night from the Touhou series was used at 1:34 (a nod to Niconico covers) and a variation based on Lindsey Stirling’s cover at 1:47. The “guitar riff” part of the song was skipped in favor of a more gentle bridge and reprise.

item.title: Twice 4th Anniv Medley (live)
item.description: 🎹 Twice we FANCY YOU (medley) #Twice4thAnniversary #TWICEMakesMeFeelSpecial #Twice #piano #live https://t.co/EZKzmqV0gK — Ryu (@poly2d) October 20, 2019 Excerpts FANCY (~0:00) What is Love? (~2:00) Like OOH-AHH (~3:28) Dance the Night Away (~4:57) Heart Shaker - outro (~6:45) Notes I stuck to the A-side tracks for this medley. I just used the songs that came to my mind, but if I were to retroactively state a reason for each:

item.title: Bios - Guilty Crown (live)
item.description: 🎹 Guilty Crown - βios ギルティクラウン OST #Piano #Music https://t.co/mhtr6ELk5O — Ryu (@poly2d) October 14, 2019 Notes Based on the Animenz arrangement Video: https://youtu.be/DcjUOdeq6G8 Sheet: https://sheet.host/sheet/1uMLWW Original: https://youtu.be/UMCka_vXtL4 The soundtrack of the Guilty Crown series was what led me to find Animenz on youtube in early 2012. I found his cover of ßios. I had some lessons during my childhood, but by this time I had absolutely forgotten how to play piano.

item.title: 千本桜 / Senbonzakura (live)
item.description: 🎹 千本桜 / Senbonzakura live piano #初音ミク生誕祭2019 #HatsuneMikuBirthday https://t.co/HNJVg866Mn — Ryu (@poly2d) September 1, 2019 Notes Original: https://youtu.be/P6C3szts5C4 This live of Senbonzakura was for a special occasion: 13th anniversary of Hatsune Miku! I have fond memories of this song because my roommates and I played it a lot in Taiko no Tatsujin. I borrowed some small nuances and snippets from two of my favorite covers of this song (listed below) - can you spot them?

item.title: NGE Medley (live)
item.description: This was the first piano post I shared on Twitter! The hype in this day and age was how Neon Genesis Evangelion was coming to Netflix (at least for a subset of the internet 🙂). That led me to revisit some of the theme songs from the franchise. 🎹ネトフリにエヴァ来たらしいのでOPとか弾いてみる/ Songs from the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion (live piano) #evangelion https://t.co/0D1wohnbiB — Ryu (@poly2d) June 22, 2019 Excerpts 残酷な天使のテーゼ / Cruel Angel’s Thesis (TV Series OP) (Transition) [SPOILER WARNING] Ep 19 初号機が暴走する時のBGM / Unit-1 goes berserk Fly me to the moon (TV Series ED) Beautiful world (Rebuild 1.
